attributes.action: oversee that a fair and balanced planning system is adopted in Northern Ireland in line with the rest of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Planning system in Northern Ireland is in no fit state to promote sustainable and sensible decision making in the planning of future development in the region.

Northern Ireland's planning system needs to be brought in line with the rest of the UK to promote a fair and effective system that will benefit all the people in the province - from the resident to the developer.
